culture.name: Barong Dance
culture.description: Barong Dance is a traditional Balinese dance depicting the battle between good (Barong) and evil (Rangda).

culture.name: Saman Dance
culture.description: Saman Dance is a traditional Acehnese dance performed in groups with synchronized hand and body movements.

culture.name: Karapan Sapi
culture.description: Karapan Sapi is a traditional bull racing competition from Madura, East Java.

culture.name: Reog Ponorogo
culture.description: Reog Ponorogo is a traditional performance art from Ponorogo, East Java, featuring large masks and lion dance.

culture.name: Nadran Ceremony
culture.description: Nadran Ceremony is a sea ritual performed by fishermen in West Java as a form of gratitude for the sea's bounty.

culture.name: Ondel-ondel
culture.description: Ondel-ondel is a traditional Betawi performance featuring giant puppets and is an icon of Jakarta's culture.

culture.name: Ruwatan
culture.description: Ruwatan is a traditional Javanese ceremony aimed at cleansing oneself from bad luck and evil spirits.

culture.name: Pakarena Dance
culture.description: Pakarena Dance is a traditional dance from South Sulawesi depicting the grace and politeness of Bugis women.

culture.name: Ararem
culture.description: Ararem is a tradition of delivering dowries in the culture of West Papua with traditional dances and music.

culture.name: Bonet Dance
culture.description: Bonet Dance is a traditional dance from East Nusa Tenggara that reflects the spirit of togetherness and cooperation.
